title: FBP: Federal Bureau of Physics, Vol. 1: The Paradigm Shift
description: Wormholes in your kitchen. Gravity failures at school. Quantum tornadoes tearing through the midwest. As with all natural disasters, people do what they always They adapt and survive. And if things get really bad, the Federal Bureau of Physics (FBP) is only a call away. Federal Bureau of Physics is the story of Adam Young, brash and smart, he's a rising star at the FBP, but when a gravity failure leads to the creation of an alternate dimension known as a "BubbleVerse," Adam is sent on a rescue mission and finds his skills and abilities pushed to their limits when he discovers his partner has a different agenda...Collects issues #1-7
author: Simon Oliver
